Detailed Description

An application part of a multipart mime message.

Definition at line 465 of file MimePart.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum MimePartApplication::contentType
 

The type of application.

Enumeration values:
CONTENT_TYPE_APPLICATION_OCTETSTREAM  application/octet-stream
CONTENT_TYPE_APPLICATION_SMIL  application/smil W3 SMIL
CONTENT_TYPE_APPLICATION_XML  application/xml W3 XML
CONTENT_TYPE_NBR  End of contentType, not a content type.

Definition at line 470 of file MimePart.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MimePartApplication::MimePartApplication (  const byte *  buff,
uint32  buffLength,
contentType  type,
const char *  contentLocation,
bool  copyLocation,
characterSet  charset = CHARSET_END,
transferEncoding  encoding = TRANSFER_ENCODING_BASE64
) 
 

Parameters:
buff The buffer with the data to add.
buffLength The length of buff.
type The application type of the content.
contentLocation The URI of the content. If empty string then no location is set for the part.
copyLocation If the contentLocation string should be copied or just keep a pointer to it.
charset Optionally a charset can be specified for the application data. Default this is CHARSET_END and no charset is set.
encoding The transfer encoding to use on the data, default base64 encoding is used.
